newsitem.title: UK: Fidelity raises German direct marketing effort.
newsitem.headline: Fidelity raises German direct marketing effort.

text.p: Fidelity Investments said on Tuesday it was intensifying its direct marketing effort in Germany.

It said it had appointed Linda Sudendorf as head of marketing for Fidelity Direct in Germany, and would look to take advantage of opportunities in the retirement sector and developing electronic distribution channels.

Fidelity has been selling in Germany for six years, mostly through banks and brokers who account for 90 percent of Fidelity's assets, but marketing had previously been handled out of Luxembourg and the UK.
Sudendorf previously held a regional market role for Fidelity in the U.S.
